scripts.build: poetry run python scripts/prebuild.py && poetry build
scripts.lint: poetry run ruff check . && poetry run black --check .
scripts.dev: echo 'Python SDK - Use poetry commands for development'
scripts.release: pnpm release:version:patch && pnpm release:build && pnpm release:publish && pnpm release:push
scripts.release:minor: pnpm release:version:minor && pnpm release:build && pnpm release:publish && pnpm release:push
scripts.release:major: pnpm release:version:major && pnpm release:build && pnpm release:publish && pnpm release:push
scripts.release:push: git add pyproject.toml && git commit -m "chore: bump python sdk version" && git push
